column4: Hi guys. I've got a bit of a problem, and could really use any help you guys can provide me. I've got a ubuntu server in a datacenter (hence the fact I don't want to reboot the machine if I can prevent it), and resently I added a Nokia phone as a SMS modem for an experiment. This phone is connected through USB, how ever the phone seems to have locked up the USB connection. I used to be able to fix this by doing rmmod uhci_hcd; modprobe uhci_hcd to reset th
It has been cut off after "to reset".
sorry, didn't realize that: to continue
